title: [Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade]
description: Bathed in pale moonlight, this glade is full of tall grass and brightly colored wildflowers.  Ancient trees are visible to the north and the sound of flowing water can be heard from the south.  A crisp, cool breeze ripples the grass in front of you.

Bathed in bright sunlight, this glade is full of tall grass and brightly colored wildflowers.  Ancient trees are visible to the north and the sound of flowing water can be heard from the south.  A crisp, cool breeze ripples the grass in front of you and carries upon it a strong scent of pine.

Bathed in bright sunlight, this glade is full of tall grass and brightly colored wildflowers.  Ancient trees are visible to the north and the sound of flowing water can be heard from the south.  A crisp, cool breeze ripples the grass in front of you and carries upon it a strong scent of baked goods.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, east, south, west
